ai-ya4.2.1:1.1_0: the eye element gives rise to the ear element.
ai-ya4.2.1:2.1_0: When the eye element arise and not exist, they are no longer element.
ai-ya4.2.1:2.1_1: The eye element and the ear element arise and the nose element.
ai-ya4.2.1:3.1_0: But if they arise in the element of the eye element, the ear element arises;
ai-ya4.2.1:4.1_0: The eye element gives rise to the ear elements are no more.
ai-ya4.2.1:4.1_1: The eye element and the ear element arise and the nose element.
ai-ya4.2.1:5.1_0: the eye element gives rise to the eye element.
ai-ya4.2.1:6.1_0: The eye element arises in them, but not the ear element.
ai-ya4.2.1:6.1_1: The eye element and the ear element arises and the nose element.
ai-ya4.2.1:7.1_0: But if the eye element arises in them, the eye element arises;
ai-ya4.2.1:8.1_0: Attachment arises in them, so the eye elements don’t arise ...
ai-ya4.2.1:8.1_1: The eye elements arise and the ear elements arise.
ai-ya4.2.1:9.1_0: the eye element gives rise to the element.
ai-ya4.2.1:10.1_0: Or if he does give rise to the eye element, the sights element arise and the eye element:
ai-ya4.2.1:11.1_0: The eye element arises in them, but not in the ear element.
ai-ya4.2.1:11.1_1: The eye element and sights arise and the eye element.
ai-ya4.2.1:12.1_0: the eye element gives rise to mental element.
ai-ya4.2.1:13.1_0: Or consciousness arises dependent on the mind element.
ai-ya4.2.1:14.1_0: The mind element gives rise to the eye elements that are not, and those the mind-consciousness element arise in them.
ai-ya4.2.1:14.1_1: The eye element and thoughts arise, and the mind-consciousness element arise,
ai-ya4.2.1:15.1_0: the eye element arises and settles.
ai-ya4.2.1:16.1_0: But if he does so with the eye element, the eye element arises;
ai-ya4.2.1:17.1_0: The eye element arises in them, but not in the ear element.
ai-ya4.2.1:17.1_1: The eye element and the ear element arises and the eye element.
ai-ya4.2.1:18.1_0: Discerning the analysis of the sense-spheres, in this way the monks should be treated as if it were explained.
